Package net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.plain

Class PlainComponentSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.plain.PlainComponentSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentEncoder<Component,​java.lang.String>, ComponentSerializer<Component,​TextComponent,​java.lang.String>, Buildable<PlainComponentSerializer,​PlainComponentSerializer.Builder>
    @ScheduledForRemoval(inVersion="5.0.0")
@Deprecated
public class PlainComponentSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentSerializer<Component,​TextComponent,​java.lang.String>, Buildable<PlainComponentSerializer,​PlainComponentSerializer.Builder>
    Deprecated.
    for removal since 4.8.0, use PlainTextComponentSerializer instead
    A plain component serializer.

    Plain does not support more complex features such as, but not limited to, colours, decorations, ClickEvent, and HoverEvent.

    Since:
    4.0.0
